title: Understanding the 34th Percentile
text: The percentage of data values that are less than or equal to the 34th percentile is 34%.

title: Determining Directionality
text: Based on this, since the 34th percentile of housing prices in the town you want to move to is $240,000, does that equate to 34% of housing prices to be $240,000 or less OR $240,000 or more?
